Reptilica slows down as he feels Desmonus' tugg=
ing, looking at her as 
she smiles at him. He steps toward her at her words=

slide an arm around her waist. Behind her, Bloodystrike al=
so steps 
closer, also trying to slide an arm around her.

"A rest you can =
have," Bloodystrike says, "Reptilica was leading us 
to a suitable resting =
spot, I think its a good idea."
